productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 736 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MILITARY-STYLE DATA TRANSPORT WITH USB 3.0 & 2.0 Your files are important — that's why you're taking them with you. Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0 flash drives help keep them safe. The anodized, aircraft-grade aluminum housing is waterproof to 200 meters, vibration-resistant, and shock-resistant.

USB 3.0 SPEED If you move a lot of data, you've noticed that as convenient as USB flash drives are, they never seem to be as fast as you'd like. USB 3.0 changes the game. Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0 offers read speeds up to four times faster than traditional USB 2.0 drives.

HIGH-PERFORMANCE USB 2.0 SUPPORT Not only is Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0 backward compatible with USB 2.0 — it offers great performance, too. No matter how up-to-date your PC is, you'll be able to quickly take care of moving your files and be off on your next adventure.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY It works with Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, and even Linux without drivers, and there's no software to install. Just plug it in, and go. If your computer has a USB 2.0 or 3.0 connector, you can use Flash Survivor Stealth USB 3.0.

PROVEN RELIABILITY With almost two decades of building enthusiast-grade memory and components, we've earned a reputation for quality, compatibility, and performance. Need help? We're available by phone call, email or web forum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars water proof and well protected
reviews.reviewText: I am a DJ and use this mainly to store my music. This flash drive is perfect for DJing if you have a stand alone controller. It is waterproof and the cover protects the drive from damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bulletproof and reliable thumb drive
reviews.reviewText: These thumb drives screw into a metal container - which is as close to a bulletproof housing as you are going to get. This makes them suitable for travel, even wilderness travel. They are not the cheapest or highest capacity drives out there, but I have several and have found them to be reliable. No need to get these if all you are doing is transferring files from one computer to another, but if you want to travel with them, or backup stuff for a long period of time, I recommend these as a good option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well built
reviews.reviewText: If you're like me and kind of rough on things, this is a must buy. It is very well built. I was going to put it on my keyring but I didn't want to scratch it. I have no doubt that it could of took the abuse though. I use it almost daily to work on a project at the house and on the go on my laptop.I wish it didn't look as good so I could put it on my keyring but I opened it up and decided I didn't want to get it scratched. That would be the only "bad" thing, if you can call it that, to say about it. That it looks too good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Durability & water resistance are excellent. I have been using an older model for close to 10 years & it has taken a beating & still works flawlessly. When I needed a second one there was no decision to make. This one is just as good and has much greater storage capacity. Very happy with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for DJing with Rekordbox
reviews.reviewText: While I read mixed reviews and recommendations about the read/write speed for exporting tracks out of Rekordbox, this thing is blazing fast. Are there slightly faster drives? Yes, but this will get the job done in a matter of seconds regardless. Let alone, the difference between this and a Sandisk Extreme Pro is unnoticeable when loading tracks on a controller/unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice 256GB Flash Drive
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nice, secure, durable way to store and transport your files. Photo, I thought, the drive would separate from my Keychain. As in my video, I was mistaken. The drive remains attached to the Keychain. Other than that, great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One BA USB
reviews.reviewText: This product is the cream of the crop . And if washing usb sticks by accident is an issue … then breath a sigh of relief this thing has you covered .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enough space to bring your computer's essential data everywhere you go.
reviews.reviewText: This kind of product makes it possible to work between computers from place to place. It's fast, durable, and has plenty of work space even for video. Just encrypt your sensitive data appropriately and take it with you. No need to carry a computer laptop and all of its accessories.

These are probably one of the best usb storage devices on the market. The only issue I have is that they are costly little buggers. They are clearly double the cost or more of similar products in the same category. I've ordered both the 128 Gb and the 256 Gb devices. Both are solid and reliable. I very much like the protection their covers afford when transporting from place to place. Full aluminum outer casings with rubber seals and fast transfer speeds while using. Now, if only Corsair could lower the cost a little - really?!
Digital DJならこれがいちばんオススメだと思います。ケースをよく失くしてしまうのでそこだけが惜しい点です。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Feels like the sort of thing Bear Grylls would design to be honest! 5/5
reviews.reviewText: Great solid construction, sturdiest feeling USB stick i have ever owned, I'm using the 256GB version as a Mac Time Machine backup drive, literally works as advertised "plug in and go", unable to test the usb 3.0 speeds due to age of my machine, to look at the picture I thought the bumpers and/or end caps would be plastic, but both ends are aluminum and the bumpers it rests on when laid down are rubber.Feels like the sort of thing Bear Grylls would design to be honest.When connected to my laptop (2011 macbook pro) the rubber bumpers are just the right height to stop the USB stick moving and damaging the USB port, see pic 5Hope it lasts as well as its built, but if not according to manufacturers website, product has a 5 year warrantyhttp://www.corsair.com/en-gb/support/warrantyItem was pricey just under £100 for 256GB, but definitely seems fair for the build quality! Ill probably buy a smaller capacity one for work use soon.
Best usb I've had to date. Durable, fast and decent value!
